title: MFI portfolio touches Rs 4 lakh crore across India
description: Micro-finance Institutions portfolio has touched almost Rs four lakh crore during the third quarter of the current financial year, according to the self-regulatory organisation Microfinance Industry Network (MFIN) report. The report said that the industry saw a robust growth of 24.6 per cent over the last financial year, while portfolio delinquency has reached pre-COVID levels indicating improving health of the sector.
